intro.paragraph: Every successful brand begins with clarity. I guide you through a structured process that uncovers your purpose, aligns your message, and creates design that truly resonates.

profile.paragraphOne: For the past 7 years I‚Äôve been helping entrepreneurs, retreat & wellness centers, and small businesses build brands that feel authentic, look distinctive, and work beautifully online.
profile.paragraphTwo: My approach combines strategic thinking with clean, emotional design ‚Äî so your audience instantly understands who you are and why you matter.
profile.planProjectAria: Plan your project ‚Äì scroll to contact form

howIWork.heading: That‚Äôs how I

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: We define your purpose, audience, and message. This step builds the strategic foundation your brand needs ‚Äî clear positioning, meaningful storytelling, and a direction that actually moves you forward.

design.title: Design
design.description: Your brand identity takes shape: logo, colors, typography, visual system. Everything is crafted to reflect your purpose and create instant recognition.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: We turn strategy and design into a ready-to-launch digital experience. Your website becomes clear, intuitive, emotional ‚Äî and aligned with your long-term goals.

paragraphOne.start: Every project is an opportunity to create something that not only looks beautiful but also

homeDiscoveryCta.heading: Feeling overwhelmed by the possibilities?
homeDiscoveryCta.paragraph: If you run a retreat center, wellness venue or holistic space and you‚Äôre not sure where to start with branding, website and bookings ‚Äî I‚Äôll guide you step-by-step until your first inquiries arrive.

brisa-bahia.title: Brisa Bah√≠a ‚Äî Retreat brand & website
brisa-bahia.summary: Story-first brand system and fast, mobile-first website.
brisa-bahia.challenge: A new retreat needed a brand that felt warm, professional, and authentic ‚Äî not corporate or generic.
brisa-bahia.solution: Created a cohesive visual identity and storytelling-first website that reflects the retreat's unique character.
brisa-bahia.result: A distinctive brand and fast, accessible site that attracts the right guests and communicates genuine hospitality.

virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.title: Virtuelles Fastnachtsmuseum ‚Äî digital exhibit
virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.summary: Digital museum experience preserving cultural heritage.
virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.extraNote: Created design, animations, and content ‚Äî including a 20-minute interactive Bruegel painting experience (also available in English).
virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.challenge: Making traditional cultural heritage accessible and engaging in a digital format for diverse audiences.
virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.solution: Designed an intuitive virtual museum experience with thoughtful UX that honors the content while making it discoverable.
virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.result: An accessible digital archive that preserves cultural heritage and reaches audiences beyond physical museum limitations.

seo.title: Brisa Bah√≠a ‚Äî Retreat Center Branding & Website Transformation
seo.description: How I transformed Brisa Bah√≠a from an outdated lodge website into a premium retreat center brand with a custom identity, website, and facilitator-focused user experience.

hero.title: Brisa Bah√≠a ‚Äî Retreat Center Branding & Website Transformation
hero.tagline: Retreat center branding and facilitator-ready wellness retreat website design for a Colombian eco retreat.
intro: Before becoming "Brisa Bah√≠a", the project existed as the Bahia Lodge ‚Äì a simple beach lodge website inherited from the previous owner.
The new owners needed a complete transformation: clear branding, a retreat-ready experience, and a website that speaks to facilitators and conscious travelers.

I rebranded the entire project, designed a facilitator-friendly user journey, and built a bilingual WordPress website that finally reflects the jungle location, the holistic experience, and the retreat vision.

meta.services: Naming, retreat center branding, bilingual WordPress build

beforeAfter.heading: Before & After
beforeAfter.subtitle: We elevated the Bahia Lodge hostel aesthetic into a facilitator-ready retreat experience.
beforeAfter.beforeLabel: Before ‚Äî old Bahia Lodge website (previous owner)
beforeAfter.afterLabel: After ‚Äî New Brisa Bah√≠a retreat website
beforeAfter.note: Every touchpoint is optimized for facilitators booking full-center weeks.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.text: Bahia Lodge looked like a budget hostel: mismatched colors, generic copy, outdated photos, and a laggy WordPress theme patched with dozens of unsupported plugins. There was zero yoga retreat website design thinking, so facilitators could not see amenities, logistics, or trust signals.

goal.heading: The Goal
goal.text: Deliver a purely digital transformation‚Äîrename the experience, build a refined retreat center brand identity, architect the content, and launch a high-converting, bilingual site so facilitators can book entire weeks without slow DM threads.

brandIdentity.heading: Brand Identity
brandIdentity.intro: We shaped a tactile system inspired by the Colombian coast: hand-drawn patterns, soft sunlit gradients, and typography that balances ritual with clarity.
brandIdentity.logo: Modular wordmark and symbol that works on light and dark UI surfaces.
brandIdentity.colorsBefore: Before: inconsistent blues and generic beige that felt like a hostel.
brandIdentity.colorsAfter: After: grounded neutrals with botanical accents that highlight calm energy.
brandIdentity.typography: Editorial serif headlines paired with a humanist sans serif body that keeps the story readable across long itineraries.
brandIdentity.iconography: Custom icon suite describing services, lodging, and rituals inside the experience guide.
brandIdentity.moodboard: Moodboard mixing lush jungle textures, ocean breeze palettes, and facilitator rituals.

brandMindmap.title: Brand Strategy Mindmap
brandMindmap.description: Mapped core values, emotional triggers, and facilitator expectations to keep every design decision tied to purpose.

uxStructure.heading: UX Structure
uxStructure.intro: The site structure leans on retreat center UX design: every navigation path answers the questions facilitators ask about capacity, logistics, sample itineraries, and onsite support.

websiteMindmap.title: Website Mindmap
websiteMindmap.description: Flows for hosts, facilitators, and guests defined how the bilingual experience should introduce every space and service.

uxStructure.responsiveIntro: Facilitators review the experience on their phones first, so every section was built with touch interactions, offline reading, and quick-scroll anchors in mind.

wireframe.title: Wireframe (Full Website Structure)
wireframe.description: The full-length wireframe is sliced into digestible sections so teams can scan each area while still accessing the entire system.

websiteDesign.heading: Website Design
websiteDesign.intro: High-fidelity UI pulls the new palette, typography, and iconography into a responsive wellness retreat website design. Each scroll section sells the eco retreat website experience through story, testimonials, and actionable CTAs.
after: Homepage showing the multi-device hero, facilitator copy, and immersive photography.
Facilities page detailing hosting logistics, sample agendas, and immersive amenity highlights.

results.heading: The Result
results.subtitle: What changed for Kary & Nhung
items: First facilitator-led retreats booked through the site within a month of launch.
Facilitators now reference the offer checklist and book full-week stays without extra decks.
The new story-first retreat center branding is reused across pitch decks, onboarding docs, and partnerships.
Performance optimizations cut initial load time by 45% on the remote Caribbean connection.
Kary & Nhung now have a dedicated wellness web designer partner for seasonal updates.

testimonial.heading: Testimonial
testimonial.quote:
A Beautiful Design That Captures Our Essence: Branding & Website
We couldn't be happier with the work Jan did for Brisa Bah√≠a. From the initial logo design to the final WordPress website, he truly understood our vision for our boutique eco-retreat center on Colombia's Caribbean coast.

The logo and color palette he created perfectly capture the essence of our brand: tranquil, natural, and inviting. He has an exceptional eye for aesthetics that resonate with the wellness and retreat space. But beyond his design skills, what really stood out was working with him as a person. He was collaborative, responsive, and genuinely invested in bringing our vision to life.

The website itself is exceptional. It beautifully showcases our property while being intuitive and easy to navigate. He clearly understands what retreat centers need from their online presence: a site that not only looks stunning but also effectively communicates the transformational experience we offer.

We highly recommend Jan. He understands the industry, delivers outstanding results, and made the whole process enjoyable.

Kary, Founder & Retreat Partner, Brisa Bah√≠a
testimonial.author: ‚Äî Kary, Co-Founder of Brisa Bah√≠a
